Detailed Description

template<typename Tp_, typename AllocStr_ = RC, unsigned BlkSize_ = (2*1024*1024), unsigned BlkCacheSize_ = 4>
class stxxl::stack< Tp_, AllocStr_, BlkSize_, BlkCacheSize_ >

External vector container.

For semantics of the methods see documentation of the STL std::vector.
Template parameters:

  • Tp_ type of contained objects
  • AllocStr_ one of allocation strategies: striping , RC , SR , or FR default is RC
  • BlkSize_ external block size in bytes, default is 2 Mbytes
  • BlkCacheSize_ how many blocks use for internal cache, default is four
Examples:

test_stack.cpp.

Construction from a stack.

Parameters:
stack_ stack object (could be external or internal, important is that it must have a copy constructor, top() and pop() methods )
